title: 10 Little Known Tools To Grow Your YouTube Channel FAST 2017 -  Mrinal Saha
tags: how to grow a youtube channel
How to Grow a YouTube Channel
how to grow your youtube channel
how to grow your youtube channel fast 2016
how to grow your channel fast
description:
So, here is how to grow your youtube channel fast. 

* 10 Tools that will help you grow your YouTube channel *


1. Start with  Youtube creator academy boot camp
https://creatoracademy.youtube.com/page/education

2. Tubebuddy
https://www.tubebuddy.com/

3 Studio App

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/youtube-creator-studio/id888530356?mt=8

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.youtube.creator&hl=en


4. Legend

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.stupeflix.legend&hl=en

Other Android Apps to Create Text Animation For YouTube Videos
http://techwiser.com/text-animation-video/


5. Automatic captions
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=erx9czQsY2Q


6. Gleam
https://gleam.io/


7. Panzoid
https://panzoid.com/


8. FameBit
https://famebit.com/

9. Canva
https://www.canva.com/

10 Research tool
http://techwiser.com/research-for-youtube-videos/

Also Watch this video by Game Theory: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tyHaMVRgBV0&t=43s
